predicate.note: Frames file for 'tug' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet.

roleset.name: carry by tugging

example.name: compare with tug.03
example.text: John tugged his heavy cedar chest to the center of the hallway.

roleset.note: This and tug.03 are very similar--tug.03 is a resultative, tug.01 is more directional.

example.name: Picard maneuver
example.text: John tugs on the hem of his shirt whenever he stands up.

role.descr: other thing tugged or secondary attribute, result of arg1

example.name: not tug apart
example.text: But yesterday, the heavy trading action eventually consumed not only Messrs. Jacobson and Bates but four other Jacobson partners, all doing their specialist-firm job of *trace* tugging buyers and sellers together and adjusting prices to accommodate the market.
